overview: Paul R. Sohmer, M.D. serves as the Company’s President and Chief Executive Officer. Prior to joining Viracor-IBT in January of 2011, Dr. Sohmer served as CEO of both public and privately held growth companies focused on laboratory services, medical devices, and biotechnology including TriPath Imaging, Inc., Neuromedical Systems, Inc., Genetrix, Inc., the Pathology Institute, Inc. and, most recently, Orthocon, Inc. During his tenure with the Pathology Institute, he led the first commercial introduction of polymerase chain reaction (PCR) for diagnosis and founded the Chiron Reference Laboratory. Within laboratory services, Dr. Sohmer brings a broad range of leadership experience including hospital-based, esoteric reference, and national reference laboratory oversight and direction. A graduate of Northwestern University and the Chicago Medical School, Dr. Sohmer was named the Ernst and Young Carolinas Life Sciences Entrepreneur of the YearÂ® in 2005.
